name: Sepulcher (Ále Acevedo)
description:
MOVEMENT - WASD/ARROWS

SPRINT - PRESS & HOLD SPACEBAR

HIDE - PRESS & HOLD H

COLLECT KEYS

LISTEN FOR PURSUER

HIDE, THEN BANISH THEM
